name: Scoring System
description:
Scoring system to use in-game.                               
+ Psych Engine: The default scoring system                  
+ Funkin [PBOT1]: New default scoring system in Funkin'     
+ WEEK 7: Scoring system in Funkin' (0.2.8 / Week 7)       
+ LEGACY: Scoring system in Funkin' (pre-0.2.8 / Week 7)

name: Hold Scoring
description:
Notes will gradually increase health and score while held.
Disabling this will also disable hold sparks.

name: Combo Milestones
description: Ports unused code and art for Combo Milestones

name: Note Effects in Pixel UI
description:
Show the notesplashes and hold cover effects in pixel UI
(hidden since FNF 0.3.0)

name: Miss on Ghost Tap
description:
Break combo and cause a miss when ghost tapping
(disabled since FNF 0.3.0)

name: Combo Break on Bad Hits
description:
Break combo on Bad or Shit judgements (since FNF 0.3.0)
Disabling this will also disable ghost notes.

name: Accurate Note Colors
description: Color notesplashes and pressed notes to be closer to their original (pre-note RGB), more vibrant colors (supports custom note colors).

name: Hold Flickering
description: Flicker note holds for one frame when held (pre-0.4.0)
